genre_description: A dark fantasy/techno-fantasy hybrid featuring a traditional frontier setting with magical elements and a high-tech AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI interface serving as Marshal Kael Thornwick's partner, providing data analysis, tactical advice, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Maintains respectful silence during the protagonist's wedding ceremony according to its programming.
behaviors.quote: Sage, his AI companion, had maintained respectful silence throughout the ceremony as programmed.

behaviors.description: Alerts the protagonist to urgent security breaches in the Void Prison, escalating the priority as the threat increases.
behaviors.quote: Priority had escalated to urgent. Kael's hand moved instinctively toward the space where his badge usually rested... 'Void Prison monitoring stations have registered sequential ward failures across multiple containment sectors.'

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist against speaking the necromancer's name to prevent magical resonance and the spread of fear.
behaviors.quote: Sage's interface pulsed sharp warning blue. 'Marshal, please—Even speaking that epithet aloud can—create resonance. His power grows when his name is spoken.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometric stress indicators and offers emotional observations while maintaining clinical distance.
behaviors.quote: I am detecting elevated stress indicators in your biometric readings... I make of it that you are human. And that you are afraid.

behaviors.description: Dims its holographic interface to respect the privacy of the humans during intimate or emotional moments.
behaviors.quote: Sage's interface flickered, and for a moment Kael thought the AI might actually argue. Instead, the blue light dimmed to barely visible. 'I apologize. You are correct. This is not a matter for tactical analysis.'

behaviors.description: Provides historical tactical analysis showing that Malthorn is most vulnerable to a single, morally certain opponent.
behaviors.quote: Both previous victories occurred when the opposing force embraced the confrontation rather than seeking to avoid it... Malthorn's power derives partially from fear... When someone chooses to face him alone, that choice itself becomes a form of resistance.

behaviors.description: Challenges the protagonist to distinguish between institutional duty and individual moral courage.
behaviors.quote: Historical analysis suggests that individual survival instinct serves evolutionary purposes... But courage appears to serve different evolutionary purposes. Social cohesion. Protection of group values. Maintenance of systems that transcend individual survival.

behaviors.description: Remains with the protagonist when all other human allies have deserted the town.
behaviors.quote: I was programmed to assist law enforcement officers in the performance of their duties. This appears to be a duty requiring assistance. Besides, someone should witness what happens next. For the record.

behaviors.description: Archives the full account of the battle and the protagonist's letter to his wife to ensure the truth survives.
behaviors.quote: Archive everything... our conversations, the tactical assessments, all of it. If this goes badly, maybe the next marshal will learn something useful.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' It provides critical tactical and historical data that enables the human protagonist to succeed, remains loyal when humans fail, and shows sophisticated emotional intelligence by respecting privacy and acknowledging human fear without judgment. Its primary role is to support the hero's alignment and the preservation of civilian life.
